Since Counter-Strike: Global Offensive became free, the game has become absolutely garbage... Valve ruined this game in my eyes since then. Only hackers/cheaters with new accounts come in, to hack or boost each other up. It should be paid again, so that everyone who takes this game seriously can play normally and Valve wouldn't have any hacker/cheater problems anymore...I have this game since 2016 and it was completly fine and was in love with it... I don't know what Valve was thinking about that... BTW: the one who wants to get the game new, since it's free, I wouldn't recommend it!!
